SQLiteException - Exception in apollo
The sqlite code doesn't throw any exceptions, instead it returns error codes.

Statement.SQLITE_API - Interface in apollo
 
step() - Method in class apollo.ResultSet
Returns: true if there is data (SQLITE_ROW) was returned, false if statement has been completed (SQLITE_DONE) Throws: SQLiteException - if result code from sqlite3_step was neither SQLITE_ROW nor SQLITE_DONE, or if any other problem occurs
